about.textAbout1: I am a nutritionist and postdoctoral researcher at UFRJ, passionate about connecting science, food, and memories. With a PhD from Universidad CEU San Pablo and a Master's from UFRJ, I focus on pre-diabetes, gut health, and weight loss. In my travel recipe book, I combine stories and flavors from around the world with a lighthearted approach to eating.
about.textAbout2: My mission is to show that healthy weight loss doesn't come from restrictive diets, but from smart choices that take care of the body and the relationship with food.

services.serviceSubTitle: I will help you lead a healthy life.
services.serviceCardText1: Exclusive eating plan, adapted to your goals and lifestyle.
services.serviceCardText2: Continuous monitoring to ensure real and sustainable results.
services.serviceCardText3: Each consultation is designed to meet your needs.
services.serviceCardText4: Smart strategies for weight loss with balance and well-being.
services.serviceCardText5: Specialized nutritional control to promote quality of life.
services.serviceCardText6: Nutritional care focused on women's needs.

products.productsE-BookText1: Discover how your microbiota can be the key to losing weight easily and without complicated diets.

FAQ.faqQuestion1: Can I return the book if I change my mind?
FAQ.faqAnswer1: Yes. You have up to 7 calendar days after receiving the book to cancel the purchase. In this case, I will refund the full amount paid.
FAQ.faqQuestion2: What if the book arrives with a problem?
FAQ.faqAnswer2: If the book arrives defective or damaged during transport, you can choose: receive a new copy or get your money back. Just let me know, and I will take care of everything so you don't have to worry.
FAQ.faqAnswer3: You can pay with a credit card or Pix. With a credit card, you can pay in up to 5 interest-free installments. With Pix, the payment is in full and confirmation is fast.
FAQ.faqQuestion4: How long does it take to ship the book?
FAQ.faqAnswer4: After payment is confirmed, I prepare everything carefully and post it at the Post Office within 2 business days.
FAQ.faqQuestion5: How long does it take to arrive?
FAQ.faqAnswer5: The delivery time varies depending on the postal code and the type of shipping you choose: PAC: more economical, but takes a little longer. Sedex: arrives faster. To give you an idea: those in Rio de Janeiro receive it in about 5 business days.
FAQ.faqQuestion6: How can I track my order?
FAQ.faqAnswer6: As soon as the book is shipped, you will receive the Post Office tracking code by email. This way, you can track every step of the delivery.
FAQ.faqQuestion7: Can I buy it as a gift?
FAQ.faqAnswer7: Yes. Just enter the recipient's address at the time of purchase. If you want, I can even include a special note inside the package.
FAQ.faqQuestion8: Where else can I buy this book?
FAQ.faqAnswer8: The physical version is available exclusively here on my website. The digital version (eBook) is available on Amazon Kindle.
FAQ.faqQuestion9: What if I have another question?
FAQ.faqAnswer9: Just contact me. I am available through the channels below, and I am the one who answers. E-mail: kenia.bispo@hotmail.com WhatsApp: +55 (21) 96952-6214

locale.localeText: A space that combines comfort, privacy, and elegance, designed to welcome you with all the exclusivity you deserve.
